name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R Wars
description: In the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone a fierce fight for power and money is going on. Lead your faction to supremacy or face the destruction. Play dirty if you need to, the most important thing is that your stalkers have the upper hand in a fight. Gather money from contracts and artifact selling, maintain your soldiers and keep them feed, defend from enemy incursions and strike back on the counter!
